definition: tree trunk/main part of sth/to manage/to work/to do/capable/cadre/to kill (slang)/to fuck (vulgar)

sentences.english: Store in a cool, dry place and kept away from children .
sentences.chinese: 宜放置阴凉干爽及儿童不能接触之处。

sentences.english: Made with incredible finesse and balance, this semi-dry wine finishes crisp and clean.
sentences.chinese: 经精心酿造，这款半干型酒回味酥脆干爽。

sentences.english: I sank gratefully into the warm, dry bed.
sentences.chinese: 我一下躺倒在温暖干爽的床上。

sentences.english: Storage: Store in a cool, dry place and kept away from children .
sentences.chinese: 宜放置阴凉干爽及儿童不能接触之处。

sentences.english: Since dampness leads to chilliness, you should also try to keep your hands and feet dry;
sentences.chinese: 湿气也能够导致寒冷，因此应该试着保持手足干爽。

sentences.english: I like to use powder after showers to stay dry and fresh.
sentences.chinese: 我喜爱在沐浴当前用爽身粉来连结干爽和清新。

sentences.english: Always use a dry scoop and replace lid tightly.
sentences.chinese: 保持附带的塑料勺干爽放入瓶内，拧紧瓶盖。

sentences.english: With these keeping her "dry, " she hasn't fussed once during nap time.
sentences.chinese: 有了这款“干爽”尿布垫，她从没在午睡中哭醒。

sentences.english: Keep your feet clean and dry.
sentences.chinese: 保持您的双脚清洁干爽。

sentences.english: you end up with dry and clean and nice lettuce.
sentences.chinese: 干爽洁净好吃的生菜就完成了。

sentences.english: If the shavings are kept dry then fungal problems should not occur.
sentences.chinese: 如果刨花保持干爽那么真菌的问题应该不会出现。

sentences.english: This gentle-sparkling wine is fresh and crisp with a floral bouquet and fruity finish.
sentences.chinese: 这款轻柔的汽酒，干爽清冽带有花香及果味余味。

sentences.english: A condom can be used to keep fire making material dry in wet weather or environments.
sentences.chinese: 套套可以让易燃物品在潮湿天气或环境中保持干爽。

definition: to flow freely (of air)/to ventilate/to breathe (of fabric etc)/to take a breath of fresh air/to divulge
to dry (of weather, paint, cement etc)/desiccation/dull/uninteresting/arid
flexible/not rigid/spongy/soft or runny (not set hard)/loose (soil)
